text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Brian's whirlwind of a record, Triple<n>Crown and beyond,
continues into the<n>new year.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They've passed the final corner into<n>the last stretch! Narita
Brian has<n>already taken the lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: She's blasted ahead! Brian's lead is<n>only growing now!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's unchallenged—no one can<n>catch up to her six—no,
seven-length<n>lead! And that's the finish!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
There was never any doubt! Narita<n>Brian's won the
Hanshin Daishoten!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well done, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe you made a personal<n>best time in a
long-distance race. You<n>truly have no bounds.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You've been chosen as Racer of the<n>Year, you're winning
all these races...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Daaang, Brian! You're not just<n>making Team Sirius happy,
you're<n>making the whole Twinkle Series<n>ecstatic! Keep it
up!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You're welcome.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Next is the spring Tenno Sho, which<n>Hayahide won last
year. Let's make it<n>a win for both siblings!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Next is the spring Tenno Sho, which<n>Hayahide won last
year. Let's make it<n>a win for both siblings!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Of course I'll win... But first I've got a<n>winning concert to go
to.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Everyone says she'll beat President<n>Rudolph's
seven-crown record. This<n>looks to be quite a year for Brian.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Indeed. Everyone, including me, has<n>high hopes for her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm like one of her fans, unable to<n>hold in my excitement for
what she'll<n>accomplish next.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Briaaan! Your race was the best<n>today!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: We know you'll win the spring Tenno<n>Sho too!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hwaaa! Brian! So that's how a Triple<n>Crown winner races!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I wanna soar high in a race like that<n>too!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I had a feeling I'd find you here.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sis... How's your leg?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'll need a little longer until I've<n>recovered. I'm starting to
get out of<n>shape.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You're doing as well as ever, Racer<n>of the Year. After that
tremendous<n>victory at the Hanshin Daishoten, I<n>can't help
but wonder how much<n>higher you'll soar.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't really have a goal in mind yet.<n>I'm just trying to
finish before anyone<n>else. That's all.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Of course. Your goalpost is<n>ever-moving, always leaving you<n>
hungry for more.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You do look like you're having fun<n>though. You really love
nothing more<n>than running.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I look like I'm having fun? Even<n>though I'm never satisfied
by any<n>race?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Yes, I'm sure of it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the Hanshin Daishoten behind<n>her, Narita Brian is back
to training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She needs to be in top shape for her<n>next big race, the
spring Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Exhale...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You look a little tired. Everything<n>good?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You look a little tired. Everything<n>good?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's no problem. I'm not even running<n>at full strength.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Glad to hear it. Let's play it safe and<n>run the woodchip
course next.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: All right, got it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Brian has the drive to keep running<n>forever.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
That's what makes her so good.<n>We'd better raise our
expectations to<n>match her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm excited to see her next race too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I feel the same, but we can't simply<n>expect her to do
everything. We need<n>to follow her example.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I'll do my best to make sure she's<n>ready to perform at her
peak.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I'll do my best to make sure she's<n>ready to perform at her
peak.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The race—isn't it almost the deadline<n>for Brian to register?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I think you're right.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh my... It'd be bad to forget that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
However good her performance, it's<n>meaningless if she
can't enter the<n>race.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I'll go right now before I forget.<n>McQueen, take care of
everyone's<n>traini—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Brian?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Wh-what happened?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Wh-what happened?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff... Wheeze...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Ugh!
